securityLoginLimitCount: Limit the number of login failures
testLdapLoginSubtitle: Save the configuration before testing the login
importLdapUserTip: Please submit the LDAP configuration before import

helpText.userGuideUrl: User first login update profile done redirect to it
helpText.emailSubjectPrefix: Tips: Some word will be intercept by mail provider
helpText.emailHostPassword: Tips: Some provider use token except password
helpText.emailEmailFrom: Tips: Send mail account, default SMTP account as the send account
helpText.emailRecipient: Tips: Used only as a test mail recipient
helpText.emailCustomUserCreatedSubject: Tips: When creating a user, send the subject of the email (eg:Create account successfully)
helpText.emailCustomUserCreatedHonorific: Tips: When creating a user, send the honorific of the email (eg:Hello)
helpText.emailCustomUserCreatedBody: Tips:When creating a user, send the content of the email
helpText.authLdapUserAttrMap: User attr map present how to map LDAP user attr to jumpserver, username,name,email is jumpserver attr
helpText.terminalSessionKeepDuration: Units: days, Session, record, command will be delete if more than duration, only in database
helpText.securityLoginLimitTime: Tip: (unit/minute) if the user has failed to log in for a limited number of times, no login is allowed during this time interval.
helpText.securityMaxIdleTime: If idle time more than it, disconnect connection Unit: minute
helpText.securityPasswordExpirationTime: Tip: (unit: day) If the user does not update the password during the time, the user password will expire failure;The password expiration reminder mail will be automatic sent to the user by system within 5 days (daily) before the password expires

helpTip.emailUserSSL: If SMTP port is 465, may be select
helpTip.emailUserTLS: If SMTP port is 587, may be select
helpTip.securityMfaAuth: After opening, all user login must use MFA(valid for all users, including administrators)
helpTip.securityServiceAccountRegistration: Allow using bootstrap token register service account, when terminal setup, can disable it
helpTip.securityPasswordUpperCase: 开启后，用户密码修改、重置必须包含大写字母
helpTip.securityPasswordLowerCase: 开启后，用户密码修改、重置必须包含小写字母
helpTip.securityPasswordNumber: 开启后，用户密码修改、重置必须包含数字字符
helpTip.securityPasswordSpecialChar: 开启后，用户密码修改、重置必须包含特殊字符
